name: [Jam] TimeShifter
description:
Made in approx. 14 hours for a hackathon internal to my company.

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Hit: left-click

Tools:

  • Unity
  • Qubicle
  • Audacity
  • Photoshop

Unfortunately, I didn't have enough time to rig and animate the characters, otherwise I'd have done it with Blender.

Have fun! :D
